channel.description: Recent content in Live Coding on This Is How To Code

item.title: Making Animated GIFs with Adobe Premiere and ffmpeg (Part 1)
item.description: TODO: Get ImageMagik installed and test the conversion in this answer https://superuser.com/a/556031/85635 I used GIF Brewery to make GIFs on my Mac. Since moving to Windows, I haven’t found a good replacement… Until now. In this session, I figure out how to get Adobe Premiere to setup the loop and then export an initial cropped file. Running that through ffmpeg give me a nice quality GIF at whatever size I specify.

item.title: Setting Up GitHub Pages
item.description: Quick example of showing how to setup a GitHub Pages repo. Prerequsites GitHub Desktop GitHub Account
